title: Richard Littlejohn for the Daily Mail
text: RICHARD LITTLEJOHN: Scotland Yard is at last introducing specialist units to deal with Extinction Rebellion who are up to their same old tricks and claim it is for the environment. The climate group hosed down the Treasury - and themselves - with fake blood (pictured) and then sat back and waited for the Old Bill to turn up. Their actions have included targeting planes flying in and out of a major international airport should be classed as an act of terrorism. Last Christmas, 150,000 people due to fly out of Gatwick had their travel plans ruined by reports of a drone in the vicinity. If Al Qaeda claimed responsibility, there would be a full-scale alert and tanks on the perimeter. But because Extinction Rebellion say they're doing it to save the planet, that's all right then. ...read
